column5: Hi all,  just wonder that how long would you keep using the very same Berkley Gulp/Alive bait until you think the scent is completely gone and decide the replace?  I kinda dont want to throw them away unless I am 100% sure it is done .. I mean, even they can still be used al normal bait with no scent ..  Thanks!
I would keep using it until the action is too badly damaged. I dont think they can loose their scent. I belive action and color come before scent and texture.
